name: Sarwar
text: Triumphant indeed are the believers,

name: Sarwar
text: who are submissive to God in their prayers,

name: Sarwar
text: who avoid impious talks,

name: Sarwar
text: pay their religious tax

name: Sarwar
text: and restrain their carnal desires

name: Sarwar
text: except with their spouses and slave-girls. The practice of carnal relations is lawful with them.

name: Sarwar
text: Those who desire to go beyond such limits they commit transgression,

name: Sarwar
text: those who are true to their trust,

name: Sarwar
text: to their promise,

name: Sarwar
text: and who are steadfast in their prayer.

name: Sarwar
text: These are the heirs of Paradise wherein they will live forever.

name: Sarwar
text: We have created the human being from an extract of clay

name: Sarwar
text: which was then turned into a living germ and placed in safe depository.

name: Sarwar
text: The living germ, then, was turned into a shapeless lump of flesh from which bones were formed. The bones, then, were covered with flesh. At this stage, We caused it to become another creature. All blessings belong to God, the best Creator.

name: Sarwar
text: Thereafter you will certainly die

name: Sarwar
text: and you will be brought back to life again on the Day of Resurrection.

name: Sarwar
text: We have created seven heavens above you and have never been neglectful to Our Creation.

name: Sarwar
text: We have sent a measure of water from the sky to stay on earth and We have the power to take it away.

name: Sarwar
text: We have established for you gardens of palm trees and vineyards with this water with many fruits for you to consume.

name: Sarwar
text: We have also created for you the tree that grows on Mount Sinai which produces oil and relish for those who use it.

name: Sarwar
text: There is a lesson for you concerning cattle. We provide you with drink from their bellies and many other benefits. You can consume them as meat.

name: Sarwar
text: You are carried by the animals on land and by the ships in the sea.

name: Sarwar
text: We sent Noah to his people who said, "My people, worship God for He is your only Lord. Will you then not have fear of Him?"

name: Sarwar
text: The chiefs of the unbelievers said to the others, "He is a mere mortal like you. He wants only to be superior to you. Had God wanted He would have sent the angels (instead of him). We have never heard from our fathers anything like what he says.

name: Sarwar
text: He is only an insane person. Wait for some time. Perhaps he will come to his senses."

name: Sarwar
text: Noah prayed, "Lord, help me; they have called me a liar".

name: Sarwar
text: We inspired him, saying, "Build the Ark before Our eyes and by the instruction of Our revelation. When our decree comes to pass and water comes forth from the Oven, embark in the Ark with a pair of every kind of animals and your family except those already doomed (to perish). Do not plead with Me for the unjust; they will be drowned."

name: Sarwar
text: When all of you settle in the Ark, say, "Only God Who has saved us from the unjust people deserves all praise".

name: Sarwar
text: Say, "Lord, grant us a blessed landing from the Ark; You are the One who provides the safest landing".

name: Sarwar
text: In this story there is enough evidence (of the Truth); thus do We try (mankind)

name: Sarwar
text: We brought another generation into existence after the people of Noah.

name: Sarwar
text: We sent to them a Messenger from among their own people who told them, "Worship God; He is your only Lord. Will you then not have fear of Him?"

name: Sarwar
text: A group of his people who disbelieved him and had called the Day of Judgment a lie and whom We had made prosperous in this life, said, "He is a mere mortal like you. He eats and drinks as you do.

name: Sarwar
text: If you follow a mortal like yourselves you will certainly be lost.

name: Sarwar
text: Does he promise you that after you die and become dust and bones you will be brought back to life again?

name: Sarwar
text: Such a promise will never come true.

name: Sarwar
text: This is our only life. We live and will die but we will never be brought back to life again.

name: Sarwar
text: He is only a man who invents lies against God, so have no faith in him".

name: Sarwar
text: The Messenger prayed, "Lord, help me; they have called me a liar".

name: Sarwar
text: God replied, "After a very short time they will certainly regret for their deeds."

name: Sarwar
text: A blast struck them for a just cause, and We made them look like withered leaves. God keeps the unjust people away from His mercy.

name: Sarwar
text: After them We brought another generation into existence.

name: Sarwar
text: Every nation has an appointed life span.

name: Sarwar
text: We sent Our messengers one after the other but whenever a Messenger would come to a nation, its people would call him a liar and We would destroy one nation after the other, thus, only their stories were left behind them. God keeps the unbelievers far away from His Mercy.

name: Sarwar
text: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our miracles and clear authority

name: Sarwar
text: to the Pharaoh and his nobles. But they behaved proudly and thought themselves superior people.

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Should we believe in two mere mortals who are like ourselves and whose people are our slaves?"

name: Sarwar
text: They called them liars and consequently were destroyed.

name: Sarwar
text: We gave the Book to Moses so that perhaps they may have guidance.

name: Sarwar
text: We made the son of Mary and his mother a miracle and settled them on a high land, quite secure and watered by a spring.

name: Sarwar
text: I told them, "Messengers, eat from the pure things and act righteously; I know all that you do.

name: Sarwar
text: Your religion is one and I am your Lord. Have fear of Me".

name: Sarwar
text: The people divided themselves into many sects, each with their own book and each happy with whatever they had.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), leave them alone in their dark ignorance for an appointed time.

name: Sarwar
text: Do they think that We are helping them by giving them children and property?

name: Sarwar
text: We provide them with the means of competing with each other in virtuous deeds, but they do not realize this.

name: Sarwar
text: Only those who are, out of fear of Him, humble before their Lord,

name: Sarwar
text: who believe in the revelations of their Lord,

name: Sarwar
text: who consider nothing equal to their Lord,

name: Sarwar
text: who spend their property for the cause of God, and whose hearts are afraid of their return

name: Sarwar
text: to God, these are the ones who really compete with each other in virtuous deeds and are the foremost ones in the task.

name: Sarwar
text: We do not impose on any soul what is beyond its capacity. We have the Book which speaks the truth and no injustice will be done to it.

name: Sarwar
text: In fact, the hearts of the unbelievers are in the dark because of their ignorance of real virtue; they act against it.

name: Sarwar
text: But when We will strike with torment those (unbelievers) who are rich, they will start to cry for help.

name: Sarwar
text: We shall tell them, "Do not cry for help on this day; you will receive none from Us".

name: Sarwar
text: Our revelations had certainly been recited to you, but you turned your backs to them

name: Sarwar
text: and arrogantly mocked and reviled them.

name: Sarwar
text: Was it that you did not give any thought to it (the Quran)? Was it different from what was revealed to your fathers?

name: Sarwar
text: Or did you not recognize your Messenger and, thus, denied him (Muhammad)

name: Sarwar
text: or you said that he is possessed by satan? In fact, he has brought you the truth, but most of you dislike it.

name: Sarwar
text: Had the truth followed their desires, the heavens and the earth and all that is in them would have been destroyed. We sent them the Quran but they ignored it.

name: Sarwar
text: (Do they disbelieve because) you asked them for payment? The reward that you will receive from your Lord is the best. He is the best Provider.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), you certainly have called them to the right path,

name: Sarwar
text: but those who disbelieve the life hereafter deviate from the right path.

name: Sarwar
text: Even if We were to grant them mercy and rescue them from hardship, they would still blindly persist in their rebellion.

name: Sarwar
text: We struck them with torment, but they did not submit themselves to their Lord, nor did they make themselves humble

name: Sarwar
text: until We opened the gate of greater torment (death) and they suddenly found themselves in despair.

name: Sarwar
text: It is God who has created ears, eyes, and hearts for you. Little are the thanks that you give.

name: Sarwar
text: It is God who has settled you on the earth and before Him you will all be assembled.

name: Sarwar
text: It is He who gives life and causes death and it is He who alternates night and day. Will you not then understand?

name: Sarwar
text: They say exactly the same thing as the people who lived before.

name: Sarwar
text: They say, "When we die and become dust and bones, shall we then be raised up again?

name: Sarwar
text: Our fathers and we have been given such promises before. These are no more than ancient legends."

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), say to them, "Tell me, if you know, to whom does the earth and its contents belong?"

name: Sarwar
text: They will quickly reply, "It belongs to God." Say, "Will you not, then, take heed?"

name: Sarwar
text: Ask them, "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Great Throne?"

name: Sarwar
text: They will quickly say, "It is God." Say, "Will you not then have fear of Him?"

name: Sarwar
text: Ask them, "If you have any knowledge, in whose hands is the ownership of all things? Who is the one who gives protection and yet He Himself is never protected?"

name: Sarwar
text: They will reply spontaneously, "It is God." Ask them, "Why has falsehood bewitched you?"

name: Sarwar
text: We have sent them the truth and they, certainly, are liars.

name: Sarwar
text: God has never given birth to a son and there is no other god besides Him. If there were, each god would have taken away his creatures and claimed superiority over the others. God is too exalted to be as they believe Him to be.

name: Sarwar
text: He has the knowledge of all seen and unseen things. He is too exalted to be considered equal to anything else.

name: Sarwar
text: Say, "Lord, if you will afflict them with punishment,

name: Sarwar
text: exclude me from the unjust people".

name: Sarwar
text: We have the Power to strike them with torment before your very eyes.

name: Sarwar
text: Respond to the injustice (done to you) with the better deed. We know best what they attribute to God.

name: Sarwar
text: Say, "Lord, I seek your protection against the strong temptations of the devils.

name: Sarwar
text: I seek your protection should they approach me."

name: Sarwar
text: When death approaches one of the unbelievers, he says, "Lord, send me back again

name: Sarwar
text: so that perhaps I shall act righteously for the rest of my life." Although he will say so but his wish will never come true. After death they will be behind a barrier until the day of their resurrection.

name: Sarwar
text: There will be no kindred relations nor any opportunity to ask about others or seek their assistance after the trumpet has sounded.

name: Sarwar
text: If the side of ones good deeds weighs heavier on a scale, he will have everlasting happiness,

name: Sarwar
text: but if it weighs less, one will be lost forever in hell.

name: Sarwar
text: The fire will scorch their faces and they will be groaning therein in pain.

name: Sarwar
text: (They will be told), "Were Our revelations not recited to you and did you not call them lies?"

name: Sarwar
text: They will reply, "Lord, our hard-heartedness overcame us and we went astray.

name: Sarwar
text: Lord, take us out of this and if we sin again, we shall certainly be unjust".

name: Sarwar
text: He will say, "Be quiet and say nothing."

name: Sarwar
text: There was a group of my servants among you who always prayed: Lord, forgive us and grant us mercy; You are the best of those who show mercy.

name: Sarwar
text: "You mocked and laughed at them until you forgot all about Me.

name: Sarwar
text: On this day I have given them their reward for their exercising patience and it is they who have triumphed."

name: Sarwar
text: God will ask them, "How many years did you live in your graves?"

name: Sarwar
text: They will reply. "We remained for about a day or part of it, but ask those who have kept count".

name: Sarwar
text: God will say, "You have indeed remained there for a short time. Would that you knew it during your life time.

name: Sarwar
text: Did you think that We had created you for a playful purpose and that you were not to return to Us?"

name: Sarwar
text: God is the most exalted King and the Supreme Truth. He is the only God and the Lord of the Gracious Throne.

name: Sarwar
text: One who worships things besides God has no proof of the authority of such things. God is certainly keeping the record of his deeds. The unbelievers will not have everlasting happiness.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), say, "Lord, forgive me and grant me mercy; You are the best of the Merciful Ones.
